about_the_game:
Fractal Fury is a third person online shooter with strategic dismemberment. Free to play for up to 16 players online or locally.

  • 100% free without microtransactions or pay-to-win of any kind.
  • Multiplayer and single-player with horde game mode.

DISMEMBERMENT SYSTEM


Shoot your opponents hands off to make them harmless.



Shoot their legs off to immobilise them



Shoot in a torso to destroy enemies armor and shoot in a core to destroy your enemy.
Or extract a core and use it to repair yourself or to crete an energy shield



There is also single player with hordes of zombies.

GAME MODES


  • Team Deathmatch – classic team deathmatch.
  • Capture The Flag – kill all enemy team or capture the enemy flag and bring it to your base to win a round.
  • Hardcore – very fast and tough sort of battle royale game mode. Small map, 4 minutes per round. Last alive player wins the round.

OTHER FEATURES


  • Players can host servers.
  • LAN support.
  • Single player with horde game mode.

  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bits only)
  • Processor: 4 Cores
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bits only)
  • Processor: Intel i5-3570
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2-4 GB, GeForce GTX 670

  • Storage: 3 GB available space
